data.name: Sample - AlienVault USM Anywhere - 1.2.0
data.description: AlienVault USM Anywhere Connector can be used to automate actions like get events, get event details, get alarm details, get alarms, get alarm labels, add alarm labels and delete alarm labels

workflows.name: Get Alarm Details
workflows.description: Retrieves details of alarms from the AlienVault USM Anywhere server, based on the alarm ID's you have specified.

arguments.title: AlienVault USM Anywhere: Get Alarm Details

workflows.name: Get Events
workflows.description: Retrieves all events from the AlienVault USM Anywhere server or specific events, based on the input parameters you have specified.

workflows.name: Get Event Details
workflows.description: Retrieves details for a specific event from the AlienVault USM Anywhere server, based on the event ID (UUID) you have specified.

arguments.title: AlienVault USM Anywhere: Get Event Details

workflows.name: AlienVaultUSM > Ingest
workflows.description: This playbook demonstrate the list incident operation.

resource.name: {{vars.item.rule_strategy}}-{{vars.item.rule_method}}
resource.description:
{{vars.item.audit_reason or 'N/A'}}

{%if vars.item.highlight_fields|length > 0%} {%set _item_data={}%}{%for entry in vars.item.highlight_fields%}{%set _tmp=_item_data.update({entry:vars.item[entry] or 'N/A'})%}{%endfor%} {{_item_data | json2html(row_fields=[], template="Stylized with row selection", display="Vertical", styling=false, table_style={})}}{%endif%}

routes.name: Create Record -> Update Last Alert Pull Time

workflows.name: Get Alarms
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all alarms from the AlienVault USM Anywhere server or a list of alarms, based on the input parameters you have specified.

workflows.name: Add Alarm Label
workflows.description: Adds a label to a specific alarm on the AlienVault USM Anywhere server, based on the alarm ID and label ID you have specified.

arguments.title: AlienVault USM Anywhere: Add Alarm Label

workflows.name: > AlienVaultUSM > Fetch
workflows.description: This playbook fetch the open incidents.

arguments.last_pull_time: {%if vars.steps.Get_Macro_Value.data['hydra:member']  | length > 0 or vars.request.env_setup %}{%if not vars.minutes or vars.minutes == ''%}0{% else %}{{((arrow.utcnow().shift(minutes=-vars.minutes)).format('YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss.ssss'))}}Z{% endif %}{% else %}{{((arrow.utcnow().shift(minutes=-vars.minutes)).format('YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss.ssss'))}}Z{% endif %}

step_variables._configuration_schema:
[
  {
    "title": "Pull Sample Incidents In Last X Minutes",
    "required": true,
    "editable": true,
    "visible": true,
    "type": "text",
    "name": "minutes",
    "tooltip": "Fetch incidents from last X minutes. e.g 10",
    "value": 10
  },
  {
    "title": "Status",
    "tooltip": "The status of the alarm",
    "description": "Status of the alarm based on which you want to filter alarms retrieved from the AlienVault USM Anywhere server.",
    "required": false,
    "editable": true,
    "visible": true,
    "type": "select",
    "options": [
      "Open",
      "Closed",
      "In Review"
    ],
    "name": "status",
    "value": "Open"
  },
  {
    "title": "Suppressed",
    "tooltip": "Filter alarms by the suppressed flag",
    "description": "Select this checkbox, i.e., set it to True, to filter alarms retrieved from the AlienVault USM Anywhere server by the suppressed flag.By default, this is set as False.",
    "required": false,
    "editable": true,
    "visible": true,
    "type": "checkbox",
    "name": "suppressed",
    "value": false
  },
  {
    "title": "Rule Intent",
    "tooltip": "The intent of the rule that triggered the alarm",
    "description": "Intent of the rule that triggered the alarm, based on which you want to filter alarms retrieved from the AlienVault USM Anywhere server.",
    "required": false,
    "editable": true,
    "visible": true,
    "type": "text",
    "name": "rule_intent",
    "placeholder": "Environmental Awareness"
  },
  {
    "title": "Rule Method",
    "tooltip": "The method of the rule that triggered the alarm",
    "description": "Method of the rule that triggered the alarm, based on which you want to filter alarms retrieved from the AlienVault USM Anywhere server.",
    "required": false,
    "editable": true,
    "visible": true,
    "type": "text",
    "name": "rule_method",
    "placeholder": "AWS EC2 Security Group Modified"
  },
  {
    "title": "Rule Strategy",
    "tooltip": "The strategy of the rule that triggered the alarm",
    "description": "Strategy of the rule that triggered the alarm, based on which you want to filter alarms retrieved from the AlienVault USM Anywhere server.",
    "required": false,
    "editable": true,
    "visible": true,
    "type": "text",
    "name": "rule_strategy",
    "placeholder": "Network Access Control Modification"
  },
  {
    "title": "Priority Label",
    "tooltip": "The priority of the alarm",
    "description": "Priority of the alarm based on which you want to filter alarms retrieved from the AlienVault USM Anywhere server.",
    "required": false,
    "editable": true,
    "visible": true,
    "type": "text",
    "name": "priority_label",
    "placeholder": "medium"
  },
  {
    "title": "Alarm Sensor Sources",
    "tooltip": "The uuid of the sensor",
    "description": "UUID of the sensor based on which you want to filter alarms retrieved from the AlienVault USM Anywhere server.",
    "required": false,
    "editable": true,
    "visible": true,
    "type": "text",
    "name": "alarm_sensor_sources"
  }
]

routes.name: Get Macro Value -> Set Time Configuration
Set Time Configuration -> Get Alarms Count

workflows.name: Delete Alarm Label
workflows.description: Deletes a label from a specific alarm on the AlienVault USM Anywhere server, based on the alarm ID and label ID you have specified.

arguments.title: AlienVault USM Anywhere: Delete Alarm Label

workflows.name: Get Alarm Labels
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of label IDs for a specific alarm from the AlienVault USM Anywhere server, based on the alarm ID you have specified.

arguments.title: AlienVault USM Anywhere: Get Alarm Labels
